Since 1927, Blue Plate® Mayonnaise has been perking up sandwiches and Southern​ ​classics alike, like potato salad, chicken salad, and deviled eggs. It’s made like homemade with our simple time-honored recipe of oil, vinegar, and only the egg yolks, making it extra rich and creamy.
